Uses of Class
org.transitime.core.TemporalMatch

  • Packages that use TemporalMatch 
    Package Description
    org.transitime.core
    Contains the core classes that process the AVL data and create predictions, arrival/departure times, headway, etc.
    org.transitime.core.autoAssigner
    For automatically assigning vehicles to a block assignment by looking at what blocks are available and how a vehicle matches a block spatially and temporally.
    org.transitime.db.structs
    Contains the descriptions of the classes for the objects that are read and written to the database.

    • Uses of TemporalMatch in org.transitime.core

      Methods in org.transitime.core that return TemporalMatch 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TemporalMatch TemporalMatcher.getBestTemporalMatch(VehicleState vehicleState, java.util.List<SpatialMatch> spatialMatches)
      For the spatial matches passed in determines the one that temporally makes the most sense.
      TemporalMatch TemporalMatcher.getBestTemporalMatchComparedToSchedule(AvlReport avlReport, java.util.List<SpatialMatch> spatialMatches)
      From the list of spatial matches passed in, determines which one has the best valid temporal match.
      TemporalMatch VehicleState.getMatch()
      Returns the last temporal match.
      TemporalMatch VehicleState.getPreviousMatch()
      Returns the next to last temporal match.
      TemporalMatch VehicleState.getPreviousMatch(int minimumAgeMsec)
      Goes through the match history for the vehicle and returns match that is at least minimumAge old.
      TemporalMatch AvlProcessor.matchNewFixForPredictableVehicle(VehicleState vehicleState)
      For vehicles that were already predictable but then got a new AvlReport.
      Methods in org.transitime.core that return types with arguments of type TemporalMatch 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<TemporalMatch> VehicleState.getMatches()
      Returns an unmodifiable list of the match history.
      Methods in org.transitime.core with parameters of type TemporalMatch 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void VehicleState.setMatch(TemporalMatch match)
      Sets the match for the vehicle into the history.

    • Uses of TemporalMatch in org.transitime.core.autoAssigner

      Methods in org.transitime.core.autoAssigner that return TemporalMatch 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TemporalMatch AutoBlockAssigner.autoAssignVehicleToBlockIfEnabled(VehicleState vehicleState)
      For trying to match vehicle to a active but currently unused block and the auto assigner is enabled.

    • Uses of TemporalMatch in org.transitime.db.structs

      Methods in org.transitime.db.structs with parameters of type TemporalMatch 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static VehicleEvent VehicleEvent.create(AvlReport avlReport, TemporalMatch match, java.lang.String eventType, java.lang.String description, boolean predictable, boolean becameUnpredictable, java.lang.String supervisor)
      A simpler way to create a VehicleEvent that gets a lot of its info from the avlReport and match params.
